title: [Reim Castle, Royal Chambers]
description: A small serving tray rests beneath an arched window, offering respite to those who pass.  Beside the window is a low marble bench with a variety of refreshments.  The natural lighting from the window illuminates the nearby wall, causing flecks of gold to shimmer in the light.
